header.title: CosFileTransfer_Directory

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosFileTransfer::Directory interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosFileTransfer/include/*.hrl").
This module also exports the functions described in:

func.name: list(Directory, Max) -> Return
func.fsummary: Return a list, of length Maxor less, containing Object References representing files or directories contained within the target Directory and a FileIteratoror a NILobject

desc.p: This operation returns a list, of length Max or less, containing Object References representing files or directories contained within the target Directory. If the amount of objects found is less than Max the returned Iterator will be a NIL object.
